sources.name: ABC News
sources.description: Your trusted source for breaking news, analysis, exclusive interviews, headlines, and videos at ABCNews.com.

sources.name: Al Jazeera English
sources.description: News, analysis from the Middle East and worldwide, multimedia and interactives, opinions, documentaries, podcasts, long reads and broadcast schedule.

sources.name: Ars Technica
sources.description: The PC enthusiast's resource. Power users and the tools they love, without computing religion.

sources.name: Associated Press
sources.description: The AP delivers in-depth coverage on the international, politics, lifestyle, business, and entertainment news.

sources.name: Axios
sources.description: Axios are a new media company delivering vital, trustworthy news and analysis in the most efficient, illuminating and shareable ways possible.

sources.name: Bleacher Report
sources.description: Sports journalists and bloggers covering NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, MMA, college football and basketball, NASCAR, fantasy sports and more. News, photos, mock drafts, game scores, player profiles and more!

sources.name: Bloomberg
sources.description: Bloomberg delivers business and markets news, data, analysis, and video to the world, featuring stories from Businessweek and Bloomberg News.

sources.name: Business Insider
sources.description: Business Insider is a fast-growing business site with deep financial, media, tech, and other industry verticals. Launched in 2007, the site is now the largest business news site on the web.

sources.name: Buzzfeed
sources.description: BuzzFeed is a cross-platform, global network for news and entertainment that generates seven billion views each month.

sources.name: CBS News
sources.description: CBS News: dedicated to providing the best in journalism under standards it pioneered at the dawn of radio and television and continue in the digital age.

sources.name: CNBC
sources.description: Get latest business news on stock markets, financial & earnings on CNBC. View world markets streaming charts & video; check stock tickers and quotes.

sources.name: CNN
sources.description: View the latest news and breaking news today for U.S., world, weather, entertainment, politics and health at CNN

sources.name: Crypto Coins News
sources.description: Providing breaking cryptocurrency news - focusing on Bitcoin, Ethereum, ICOs, blockchain technology, and smart contracts.

sources.name: Engadget
sources.description: Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics.

sources.name: Entertainment Weekly
sources.description: Online version of the print magazine includes entertainment news, interviews, reviews of music, film, TV and books, and a special area for magazine subscribers.

sources.name: ESPN
sources.description: ESPN has up-to-the-minute sports news coverage, scores, highlights and commentary for NFL, MLB, NBA, College Football, NCAA Basketball and more.

sources.name: Fortune
sources.description: Fortune 500 Daily and Breaking Business News

sources.name: Hacker News
sources.description: Hacker News is a social news website focusing on computer science and entrepreneurship. It is run by Paul Graham's investment fund and startup incubator, Y Combinator. In general, content that can be submitted is defined as "anything that gratifies one's intellectual curiosity".

sources.name: IGN
sources.description: IGN is your site for Xbox One, PS4, PC, Wii-U, Xbox 360, PS3, Wii, 3DS, PS Vita and iPhone games with expert reviews, news, previews, trailers, cheat codes, wiki guides and walkthroughs.

sources.name: Mashable
sources.description: Mashable is a global, multi-platform media and entertainment company.

sources.name: MSNBC
sources.description: Breaking news and in-depth analysis of the headlines, as well as commentary and informed perspectives from The Rachel Maddow Show, Morning Joe & more.

sources.name: National Geographic
sources.description: Reporting our world daily: original nature and science news from National Geographic.

sources.name: NBC News
sources.description: Breaking news, videos, and the latest top stories in world news, business, politics, health and pop culture.

sources.name: NFL News
sources.description: The official source for NFL news, schedules, stats, scores and more.

sources.name: NHL News
sources.description: The most up-to-date breaking hockey news from the official source including interviews, rumors, statistics and schedules.

sources.name: Politico
sources.description: Political news about Congress, the White House, campaigns, lobbyists and issues.

sources.name: Polygon
sources.description: Polygon is a gaming website in partnership with Vox Media. Our culture focused site covers games, their creators, the fans, trending stories and entertainment news.

sources.name: Reddit /r/all
sources.description: Reddit is an entertainment, social news networking service, and news website. Reddit's registered community members can submit content, such as text posts or direct links.

sources.name: Reuters
sources.description: Reuters.com brings you the latest news from around the world, covering breaking news in business, politics, entertainment, technology, video and pictures.

sources.name: TechCrunch
sources.description: TechCrunch is a leading technology media property, dedicated to obsessively profiling startups, reviewing new Internet products, and breaking tech news.

sources.name: The Hill
sources.description: The Hill is a top US political website, read by the White House and more lawmakers than any other site -- vital for policy, politics and election campaigns.

sources.name: The Huffington Post
sources.description: The Huffington Post is a politically liberal American online news aggregator and blog that has both localized and international editions founded by Arianna Huffington, Kenneth Lerer, Andrew Breitbart, and Jonah Peretti, featuring columnists.

sources.name: The New York Times
sources.description: The New York Times: Find breaking news, multimedia, reviews & opinion on Washington, business, sports, movies, travel, books, jobs, education, real estate, cars & more at nytimes.com.

sources.name: The Verge
sources.description: The Verge covers the intersection of technology, science, art, and culture.

sources.name: The Wall Street Journal
sources.description: WSJ online coverage of breaking news and current headlines from the US and around the world. Top stories, photos, videos, detailed analysis and in-depth reporting.

sources.name: The Washington Post
sources.description: Breaking news and analysis on politics, business, world national news, entertainment more. In-depth DC, Virginia, Maryland news coverage including traffic, weather, crime, education, restaurant reviews and more.

sources.name: Time
sources.description: Breaking news and analysis from TIME.com. Politics, world news, photos, video, tech reviews, health, science and entertainment news.

sources.name: USA Today
sources.description: Get the latest national, international, and political news at USATODAY.com.

sources.name: Vice News
sources.description: Vice News is Vice Media, Inc.'s current affairs channel, producing daily documentary essays and video through its website and YouTube channel. It promotes itself on its coverage of "under - reported stories".

sources.name: Wired
sources.description: Wired is a monthly American magazine, published in print and online editions, that focuses on how emerging technologies affect culture, the economy, and politics.
